tv.generator-info-name: WebGrab+Plus/w MDB & REX Postprocess -- version V2.1 -- Jan van Straaten

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: A woman grapples with running her mother's villa while also expecting her first child and worries that she won't be able to handle everything on her own, so she enlists two of her mother's friends for assurance, help and guidance. Along the way, she learns more about her mother's past and how faces a surprise visit from someone she's never met: her own grandmother. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Lady Bird
programme.desc: In this coming-of-age tale set in 2002 Sacramento, an eccentric teenager attending a Catholic high school deals with the pangs of first love and clashes with her mother over her plans for the future. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Jurassic World Fallen Kingdom
programme.desc: When a volcano on Isla Nublar threatens to endanger the dinosaurs, Claire recruits Owen to rescue the animals from total extinction. However, upon their arrival, they soon discover a sinister operation is afoot that exploits the animals(n)

programme.title: Gentleman Jack
programme.desc: A series set in the complex, changing world of 1832 Halifax, West Yorkshire, focuses on landowner Anne Lister, who is determined to transform the fate of her faded ancestral home, Shibden Hall, by reopening the coal mines and marrying well. The charismatic, single-minded, swashbuckling Lister—who dresses head-to-toe in black and charms her way into high society—has no intention of marrying a man. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Truth or Dare
programme.desc: An innocuous game among friends turns into a fight for survival when a group of friends playing "Truth or Dare" are mysteriously killed if they don't carry out the dare or say the truth. Now, the remaining players must find the person who started the twisted game before it is their turn to die(n)

programme.title: Sex and the City 2
programme.desc: Pals Carrie (Sarah Jessica Parker), Samantha (Kim Cattrall), Charlotte (Kristin Davis) and Miranda (Cynthia Nixon) venture outside of New York City on an adventurous trip to Abu Dhabi, where they rediscover what life was like before marriage and kids. Directed by Michael Patrick King. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Searching
programme.desc: A father spirals down an unnerving internet rabbit hole to find his missing daughter in this laptop thriller. Their seemingly idyllic family life in San Jose unravels as he makes increasingly disturbing discoveries about his daughter's secret online activities. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Game of Thrones: The Last Watch
programme.desc: An up-close and personal report from the trenches of production that reveals the tears and triumphs of the cast and crew involved in the challenge of bringing the fantasy world of Westeros to life. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: A group of calculating criminals plot to rob a U.S. Mint lying in the trajectory of a quickly approaching Category 5 hurricane. Now, a Treasury Agent and a meteorologist must work together to thwart their plans as the storm rages on(n)

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: Two scientists race to avert a catastrophe when a series of climate-control satellites begin to malfunction. During their mission, they discover a conspiracy involving the satellites, which were designed to prevent natural disasters on Earth. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: When 400,000 British and Allied troops end up trapped on the beaches of Dunkirk, France, following a catastrophic defeat during WWII, a number of civilian boats set out to rescue them before they are decimated by the approaching Nazi forces. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Searching
programme.desc: A father spirals down an unnerving internet rabbit hole to find his missing daughter in this laptop thriller. Their seemingly idyllic family life in San Jose unravels as he makes increasingly disturbing discoveries about his daughter's secret online activities. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Breaking In
programme.desc: A mother takes her teen children to her late father's high-security countryside home. Several men break in, hold the children hostage, and enable full security to lock her out. She breaks in, desperate to do whatever it takes for her kids' safety(n)

programme.title: Gentleman Jack
programme.desc: A series set in the complex, changing world of 1832 Halifax, West Yorkshire, focuses on landowner Anne Lister, who is determined to transform the fate of her faded ancestral home, Shibden Hall, by reopening the coal mines and marrying well. The charismatic, single-minded, swashbuckling Lister—who dresses head-to-toe in black and charms her way into high society—has no intention of marrying a man. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Chernobyl
programme.desc: A dramatization of the story of the 1986 nuclear accident in the Soviet Union, one of the worst man-made catastrophes in history, and of the brave men and women who sacrificed to save Europe from unimaginable disaster, all the while battling a culture of disinformation. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: Two scientists race to avert a catastrophe when a series of climate-control satellites begin to malfunction. During their mission, they discover a conspiracy involving the satellites, which were designed to prevent natural disasters on Earth. (cc)(n)

programme.title: All Eyez on Me
programme.desc: This biopic of legendary rapper Tupac Shakur depicts his rise to fame, his political activism, his growth as an artist, his connection to Death Row Records CEO Suge Knight and his untimely death at the age of 25(n)

programme.title: Ocean's Eleven
programme.desc: Remake of the 1960 Rat Pack caper about a daring heist involving an underground vault that serves three of Las Vegas' biggest casinos, and the ragtag squad of criminal specialists who try to pull it off. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Gentleman Jack
programme.desc: A series set in the complex, changing world of 1832 Halifax, West Yorkshire, focuses on landowner Anne Lister, who is determined to transform the fate of her faded ancestral home, Shibden Hall, by reopening the coal mines and marrying well. The charismatic, single-minded, swashbuckling Lister—who dresses head-to-toe in black and charms her way into high society—has no intention of marrying a man. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: When 400,000 British and Allied troops end up trapped on the beaches of Dunkirk, France, following a catastrophic defeat during WWII, a number of civilian boats set out to rescue them before they are decimated by the approaching Nazi forces. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Ruben Blades is Not My Name
programme.desc: This documentary spotlights the life and legacy of Panamian singer-songwriter Rubén Blades: a living Latin American legend and a winner of 17 Grammys. Apart from his contributions to Salsa music, it examines his life as a long-time New York City resident and the political ambitions he still harbours after his failed bid for the Panamanian presidency in 1994(n)

programme.title: The LEGO NINJAGO Movie
programme.desc: A team of six young ninjas lead double lives as ordinary high-school students. When they aren't attending class or studying, the group use their advanced fighting techniques and custom vehicles to defend the island of Ninjago from all kinds of evil. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The House
programme.desc: After realizing that they can't possibly afford the tuition for their daughter's college, a married couple team up with their eccentric neighbor to make money by running an illegal casino in the suburbs. Needless to say, things quickly spiral out of control as they deal with unruly guests while trying to keep their operation hidden from the police. (cc)(n)

programme.title: All the Money in the World
programme.desc: Dramatization of the 1973 kidnapping of John Paul Getty III, the grandson of billionaire J. Paul Getty. John's mother Gail begs J. Paul Getty to pay the ransom; when he refuses, she decides to rescue her son with the help of Getty's business associate, an ex-CIA agent named Fletcher Chase. Inspired by historical events. Certain scenes, characters and dialogue have been fictionalized for dramatic purposes(n)

programme.title: Chernobyl
programme.desc: A dramatization of the story of the 1986 nuclear accident in the Soviet Union, one of the worst man-made catastrophes in history, and of the brave men and women who sacrificed to save Europe from unimaginable disaster, all the while battling a culture of disinformation. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Deadwood The Movie
programme.desc: Past and present residents are reunited in 1889 to celebrate South Dakota's statehood. Former rivalries are reignited, alliances are tested and old wounds reopened as all are left to navigate the inevitable changes that modernity and time have wrought(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.desc: A talk show about current events with the former host of 'Politically Incorrect.' This weekly late-night forum is a virtual clone of 'P.I.,' with some Maher stand-up and a similarly diverse lineup of informed panelists, but this being HBO, the language is a good deal more blunt. In addition to the roundtable discussions, the show also features topical interviews with in-studio and satellite guests. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades Freed
programme.desc: Anastasia Steele and Christian Grey are eager to begin their lives as husband and wife, and Christian even purchases a lavish home to make a fresh start. However, they soon find themselves facing both new temptations and threats from the past. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The First Purge
programme.desc: A prequel recounting events that led up to the first Purge event. To push the crime rate below one percent for the rest of the year, the New Founding Fathers of America (NFFA) test a sociological theory that vents aggression for one night in one isolated community(n)

programme.title: Ruben Blades is Not My Name
programme.desc: This documentary spotlights the life and legacy of Panamian singer-songwriter Rubén Blades: a living Latin American legend and a winner of 17 Grammys. Apart from his contributions to Salsa music, it examines his life as a long-time New York City resident and the political ambitions he still harbours after his failed bid for the Panamanian presidency in 1994(n)

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 1 2 3
programme.desc: A New York City subway dispatcher draws on his extensive knowledge of the transportation system to thwart a criminal mastermind. Walter Garber is drifting through his daily routine when he receives word that a heavily armed gang of four has hijacked a subway train and taken all of the passengers hostage. Led by cunning thief Ryder, the gunmen will begin executing everyone aboard should the authorities fail to deliver a sizable ransom in just one hour. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: In the wake of Superman's death, Batman and Wonder Woman recruit superpowered individuals to defend humanity from an otherworldly threat called Steppenwolf. Together with their new allies—Cyborg, Aquaman and the Flash—they form the Justice League. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man And The Wasp
programme.desc: After the events of the Avengers' Civil War, Scott Lang is still struggling with his responsibilities as a superhero, when Dr. Hank Pym recruits him for another mission. This time, he must fight alongside Hope van Dyne, who's been outfitted with a suit of her own to become The Wasp. While facing off against superpowered criminal Ghost, the mismatched duo uncover secrets about the origins of their abilities. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Ocean's 8
programme.desc: Debbie Ocean, sister of notorious thief Danny, is released from prison after five years and immediately assembles an all-female, eight-person crew with her best friend Lou to stage their greatest heist: stealing a $150 million necklace at the Met Gala. Ocean must corral an actress, a jeweler, a fashion designer, a con artist, a fence and a hacker to pull off the job. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: A team of incarcerated supervillains, including Deadshot, Harley Quinn, Enchantress, El Diablo and Killer Croc, are recruited by the government for a dangerous mission in exchange for reduced sentences. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Justice League
programme.desc: In the wake of Superman's death, Batman and Wonder Woman recruit superpowered individuals to defend humanity from an otherworldly threat called Steppenwolf. Together with their new allies—Cyborg, Aquaman and the Flash—they form the Justice League. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man And The Wasp
programme.desc: After the events of the Avengers' Civil War, Scott Lang is still struggling with his responsibilities as a superhero, when Dr. Hank Pym recruits him for another mission. This time, he must fight alongside Hope van Dyne, who's been outfitted with a suit of her own to become The Wasp. While facing off against superpowered criminal Ghost, the mismatched duo uncover secrets about the origins of their abilities. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Ocean's 8
programme.desc: Debbie Ocean, sister of notorious thief Danny, is released from prison after five years and immediately assembles an all-female, eight-person crew with her best friend Lou to stage their greatest heist: stealing a $150 million necklace at the Met Gala. Ocean must corral an actress, a jeweler, a fashion designer, a con artist, a fence and a hacker to pull off the job. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Molly's Game
programme.desc: Molly Bloom finds great success organizing high-stakes poker games for celebrity clients. But when her establishment is raided by the FBI for hosting members of the Russian mob, she turns to a charismatic lawyer to help keep her out of jail. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Atomic Blonde
programme.desc: In this spy thriller set in 1989 Berlin, MI6 agent Lorraine Broughton must obtain a stolen list of Western spies while the city around her descends into chaos and revolution. In time, her pursuit leads her to uncover a much-larger conspiracy. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Break-Up
programme.desc: Battle-of-the-sexes romp about an estranged couple uncomfortably sharing their condo. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Nightingale
programme.desc: A man's mental health deteriorates at a rapid pace after an unspeakable tragedy inside his mother's home on a quiet suburban street(n)

programme.title: Bill Maher Live From Oklahoma
programme.desc: Comedian Bill Maher performs in Tulsa at the Brady Theater. Topics include the Trump presidency and his reactions to it. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Suicide Squad
programme.desc: A team of incarcerated supervillains, including Deadshot, Harley Quinn, Enchantress, El Diablo and Killer Croc, are recruited by the government for a dangerous mission in exchange for reduced sentences. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Native Son
programme.desc: The story of Bigger Thomas, a young African-American in Chicago who is hired as a chauffeur for affluent businessman Will Dalton. As Thomas enters this seductive new world of money and power, including a precarious relationship with Dalton's daughter, he faces unforeseen choices and perilous circumstances. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: A retired CIA Black Ops operative seeks vengeance for his long-time friend's murder at any cost. His relentless, globe-trotting, and violent vigilante campaign takes him as far as Turkey, where he saves a girl who was kidnapped from her mother in America. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Proud Mary
programme.desc: A hitwoman named Mary acts as a guardian angel for a young boy whose father she killed. When the youth starts working for a drug kingpin, Mary decides to intervene, setting off a chain of events that will shake Boston's criminal underworld to its core(n)

programme.title: Suburbicon
programme.desc: In 1950s suburban America, a white businessman tries to pull off an insurance scam with the help of his wife's identical twin sister. Meanwhile, a black family who recently moved in next door are forced to confront the virulent racism of their community(n)

programme.title: Sniper Ultimate Kill
programme.desc: A Colombian drug lord covertly employs a sniper known as the Devil who takes out adversaries one-by-one. The DEA sends agents to Colombia on orders to eliminate the Devil and extradite the kingpin, but the two have some surprises up their sleeves. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: A group of calculating criminals plot to rob a U.S. Mint lying in the trajectory of a quickly approaching Category 5 hurricane. Now, a Treasury Agent and a meteorologist must work together to thwart their plans as the storm rages on(n)

programme.title: Breaking In
programme.desc: A mother takes her teen children to her late father's high-security countryside home. Several men break in, hold the children hostage, and enable full security to lock her out. She breaks in, desperate to do whatever it takes for her kids' safety(n)

programme.title: The Equalizer 2
programme.desc: A retired CIA Black Ops operative seeks vengeance for his long-time friend's murder at any cost. His relentless, globe-trotting, and violent vigilante campaign takes him as far as Turkey, where he saves a girl who was kidnapped from her mother in America. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: John Oliver's satirical look at the previous week's news, politics and headlines. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Proud Mary
programme.desc: A hitwoman named Mary acts as a guardian angel for a young boy whose father she killed. When the youth starts working for a drug kingpin, Mary decides to intervene, setting off a chain of events that will shake Boston's criminal underworld to its core(n)

programme.desc: A group of calculating criminals plot to rob a U.S. Mint lying in the trajectory of a quickly approaching Category 5 hurricane. Now, a Treasury Agent and a meteorologist must work together to thwart their plans as the storm rages on(n)

programme.title: Sully
programme.desc: This biopic of airline pilot Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger depicts his successful emergency landing of an Airbus A320 on the Hudson River in January 2009. In the aftermath of this unprecedented feat, he must endure the weight of sudden fame, second-guessing by investigators and his own doubts about his actions that fateful day. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Mask
programme.desc: A meek bank official transforms into a super-suave dude when he puts on a mysterious mask that he has found(n)

programme.title: It
programme.desc: In a small town in 1989 Maine, seven bullied kids discover that a malevolent force is preying on the local children. When they realize that the town's adults can't protect them, they band together to destroy the monster, a killer clown called Pennywise. (cc)(n)

programme.title: All the Money in the World
programme.desc: Dramatization of the 1973 kidnapping of John Paul Getty III, the grandson of billionaire J. Paul Getty. John's mother Gail begs J. In the aftermath of this unprecedented feat, he must endure the weight of sudden fame, second-guessing by investigators and his own doubts about his actions that fateful day. (cc)(n)

programme.title: It
programme.desc: In a small town in 1989 Maine, seven bullied kids discover that a malevolent force is preying on the local children. When they realize that the town's adults can't protect them, they band together to destroy the monster, a killer clown called Pennywise. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Hitman's Bodyguard
programme.desc: A professional bodyguard must protect his longtime nemesis, a ruthless hit man, after the latter agrees to testify at the Hague against a dictator. The bickering pair team up to defeat the dictator's henchmen as they embark on a journey across Europe. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Gentleman Jack
programme.sub-title: "Let's have another look at your past perfect"
programme.desc: Reverend Ainsworth arrives in Halifax and, with encouragement from Mrs. Priestley, sets his sights on Ann Walker. Meanwhile, Lister presses on with the transformation of her estate, but her ambitious plans threaten to lead her into trouble. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Mamma Mia! Here We Go Again
programme.desc: A woman grapples with running her mother's villa while also expecting her first child and worries that she won't be able to handle everything on her own, so she enlists two of her mother's friends for assurance, help and guidance. Along the way, she learns more about her mother's past and how faces a surprise visit from someone she's never met: her own grandmother. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 3 Summer Vacation
programme.desc: The monster family embark on a vacation on a luxury monster cruise ship so Drac can take a summer vacation from providing everyone else's vacation at the hotel, and they indulge in all of the shipboard fun the cruise has to offer, from monster volleyball to exotic excursions, as well as catching up on their moon tans. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Pirates of the Caribbean Dead Men Tell No Tales
programme.desc: Hunted by the malevolent Captain Salazar, Jack Sparrow sets out on a quest to find a mystical artifact known as the Trident of Poseidon, and gains two new allies along the way: a gorgeous astronomer and a young sailor with a connection to Sparrow's past. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Inception
programme.desc: Dom Cobb steals ideas from people while they sleep, but his career has cost him everything in his life that's real. His only shot at redemption is to take a job in which he must plant an idea into someone's dream, rather than take one away. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Scent of a Woman
programme.desc: A blind retired military officer spends a fateful weekend in New York in the company of a prep-school student who was hired to take care of him. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The 15 17 to Paris
programme.desc: In August 2015, three American tourists subdue an armed terrorist aboard a Thalys train headed to Paris. This docudrama chronicles their lifelong friendship and the numerous choices that prepared them to act quickly in the face of sudden danger. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Thor Ragnarok
programme.desc: After being defeated in combat by his half-sister Hela, Thor ends up as an imprisoned gladiator on a distant world ruled by the Grandmaster. Now, he must work together with fellow Avenger the Hulk, another combatant fighting for the Grandmaster's pleasure, in order to escape and return to Asgard before Hela can unleash the world-ending event known as Ragnarok. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Da Vinci Code
programme.desc: Religious symbology expert Robert Langdon uncovers a conspiracy involving the life of Jesus Christ after a curator at the Louvre is found murdered with strange symbols carved into his body. Together with a gifted cryptographer, he probes the mystery while members of Opus Dei scheme to thwart their investigation. Based on the bestseller by Dan Brown. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Gentleman Jack
programme.sub-title: "Let's have another look at your past perfect"
programme.desc: Reverend Ainsworth arrives in Halifax and, with encouragement from Mrs. Priestley, sets his sights on Ann Walker. Meanwhile, Lister presses on with the transformation of her estate, but her ambitious plans threaten to lead her into trouble. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: Building security expert Will Sawyer is blamed when the tallest, most advanced building in the world, located in in Hong Kong, bursts into flames. On the run from the police, the former FBI agent and amputee must infiltrate the inferno to rescue his family trapped inside, clear his name and find out the truth behind the attack on the skyscraper. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Sicario Day of the Soldado
programme.desc: FBI agent Matt Graver enlists a mysterious operative to help investigate a Mexican drug cartel that has been smuggling terrorists into the U.S. Things escalate when the daughter of a top kingpin is abducted, forcing Graver and his partner to re-evaluate their mission. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Thor Ragnarok
programme.desc: After being defeated in combat by his half-sister Hela, Thor ends up as an imprisoned gladiator on a distant world ruled by the Grandmaster. Now, he must work together with fellow Avenger the Hulk, another combatant fighting for the Grandmaster's pleasure, in order to escape and return to Asgard before Hela can unleash the world-ending event known as Ragnarok. (cc)(n)

programme.desc: The events surrounding the 1986 nuclear accident are dramatized. (cc)(n)

programme.desc: Arthur draws the legendary sword Excalibur from the stone, and must learn to harness its power in order to lead a rebellion against his uncle Vortigern, who murdered Arthur's father and usurped the throne years ago(n)

Ocean must corral an actress, a jeweler, a fashion designer, a con artist, a fence and a hacker to pull off the job. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Just Getting Started
programme.desc: Two eccentric men get into a heated competition over who is the biggest stud at a Palm Springs resort. Later, the duo must work together when one of them fears he's been targeted for assassination by the mob. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Pacific Rim Uprising
programme.desc: When the aliens known as Kaiju invade Earth again, Mako Mori recruits her estranged brother Jake, son of fallen hero Stacker Pentecost, to lead a new team of Jaeger robot pilots. Now, the young pilots must face more advanced monsters to save the world. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Ant-Man And The Wasp

programme.title: Blockers
programme.desc: Meddling parents discover that their three teenage daughters have made a pact to lose their virginities on prom night. They decide to intervene and stop them by following the girls during the night's various wild festivities. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Geostorm
programme.desc: Two scientists race to avert a catastrophe when a series of climate-control satellites begin to malfunction. During their mission, they discover a conspiracy involving the satellites, which were designed to prevent natural disasters on Earth. (cc)(n)

Together with a gifted cryptographer, he probes the mystery while members of Opus Dei scheme to thwart their investigation. Based on the bestseller by Dan Brown. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Feeling adrift ever since they graduated from college, the Bellas are thrilled when they are offered a chance to reunite for a USO tour in Europe. Soon, the ladies get into a heated competition with the other musical acts. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: After a robbery goes awry, a young man must call on his drug-smuggling former boss to protect his girlfriend from mobsters who want to kill both of them and retrieve their cargo. (cc)(n)

programme.title: It
programme.desc: In a small town in 1989 Maine, seven bullied kids discover that a malevolent force is preying on the local children. When they realize that the town's adults can't protect them, they band together to destroy the monster, a killer clown called Pennywise. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Gentleman Jack
programme.desc: Halifax, West Yorkshire. 1832, the height of the Industrial Revolution. Gentleman Jack is based on the real life of Anne Lister, an English landowner resolute to restore her faded ancestral home by reopening the coal mines and marrying well. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Chernobyl *
programme.desc: The events surrounding the 1986 nuclear accident. Told through the stories of brave men and women. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane Heist
programme.desc: A group of calculating criminals plot to rob a U.S. Mint lying in the trajectory of a quickly approaching Category 5 hurricane. Now, a Treasury Agent and a meteorologist must work together to thwart their plans as the storm rages on(n)

programme.title: Collide
programme.desc: After a robbery goes awry, a young man must call on his drug-smuggling former boss to protect his girlfriend from mobsters who want to kill both of them and retrieve their cargo. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Insidious The Last Key
programme.desc: In the fourth installment in the "Insidious" series, parapsychologist Elise Rainier must delve even deeper into the infernal world known as "the Further" when supernatural forces target her own family. (cc)(n)

programme.title: It
programme.desc: In a small town in 1989 Maine, seven bullied kids discover that a malevolent force is preying on the local children. When they realize that the town's adults can't protect them, they band together to destroy the monster, a killer clown called Pennywise. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Bye Bye Man
programme.desc: Three Wisconsin college students encounter a monster known as the "Bye Bye Man," who terrorizes and kills his victims by manipulating them with hallucinations. The trio learn that the only way to defeat him is to drive him out of their thoughts entirely(n)

programme.title: Insidious The Last Key
programme.desc: In the fourth installment in the "Insidious" series, parapsychologist Elise Rainier must delve even deeper into the infernal world known as "the Further" when supernatural forces target her own family. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Wind River
programme.desc: A wildlife officer and a female FBI agent investigate the murder of a young woman at Wyoming's Wind River Native American reservation. In order to crack the case, the pair must brave the harsh winter terrain and the local criminal underworld. (cc)(n)

programme.title: A Wrinkle in Time
programme.desc: After her astrophysicist father goes missing, 13-year-old Meg meets three supernatural beings named Mrs. Whatsit, Mrs. Who and Mrs. Which. They transport her, her friend Calvin and her brother Charles Wallace through the universe to rescue her dad by traversing strange new planets and unlocking the power inside themselves. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Snow White and the Huntsman
programme.desc: An evil queen orders the death of Snow White, who is being trained in the art of war by a huntsman. Meanwhile, a prince becomes enthralled by Snow White's beauty and strength. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Skyscraper
programme.desc: Building security expert Will Sawyer is blamed when the tallest, most advanced building in the world, located in in Hong Kong, bursts into flames. On the run from the police, the former FBI agent and amputee must infiltrate the inferno to rescue his family trapped inside, clear his name and find out the truth behind the attack on the skyscraper. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Christopher Robin
programme.desc: Winnie the Pooh ventures into London to turn a middle-aged Christopher Robin's life around with the help of Piglet, Eeyore, and Tigger. Stuck in an oppressive white collar job that prevents him from spending time with his family, Robin is now worlds away from the atmosphere of childlike wonder that defined Hundred Acre Wood. (cc)(n)

programme.title: A Wrinkle in Time
programme.desc: After her astrophysicist father goes missing, 13-year-old Meg meets three supernatural beings named Mrs. Whatsit, Mrs. Who and Mrs. Which. They transport her, her friend Calvin and her brother Charles Wallace through the universe to rescue her dad by traversing strange new planets and unlocking the power inside themselves. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Incredibles 2
programme.desc: Mr. Incredible is left home with Violet, Dash and Jack-Jack when Elastigirl becomes the new face of superheroes in a re-branding attempt. As he juggles endless household chores, she gets to work to save everyone from a new villain. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Alpha
programme.desc: Abandoned after his first hunt in the prehistoric Ice Age, a young man is left to withstand the hostile wilderness on his own. He soon encounters and befriends a deserted wolf, and the two learn what it takes to survive as a brutal winter approaches(n)

programme.title: Rampage
programme.desc: A primatologist strives to rescue his beloved and once-peaceful albino gorilla. After an evil genetic experiment goes awry, the gorilla and two other gigantic mutated animals run amok in downtown Chicago(n)

programme.desc: Building security expert Will Sawyer is blamed when the tallest, most advanced building in the world, located in in Hong Kong, bursts into flames. On the run from the police, the former FBI agent and amputee must infiltrate the inferno to rescue his family trapped inside, clear his name and find out the truth behind the attack on the skyscraper. (cc)(n)

programme.title: Happy Death Day
programme.desc: A college student is trapped in a time loop that forces her to keep reliving a birthday that ends with her murder at the hands of a masked madman. As she repeats the same day, she tries to figure out her killer's identity so she can avoid a grisly fate(n)

programme.title: Yes, I Do
programme.desc: Busy chocolatier Charlotte has left helicopter mechanic James at the altar three times. She now needs to prove to him that she really does want to marry him. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Mask
programme.desc: A meek bank official transforms into a super-suave dude when he puts on a mysterious mask that he has found(n)

programme.title: The Taking of Pelham 1 2 3
programme.desc: Cops (Edward James Olmos, Lorraine Bracco) try to negotiate with four hijackers who have seized control of a subway train, along with 14 hostages. Mr. Blue: Vincent D'Onofrio. Mr. Green: Richard Schiff. Mr. Grey: Donnie Wahlberg. Mr. Brown: Tara Rosling(n)

programme.title: Molly's Game
programme.desc: Molly Bloom finds great success organizing high-stakes poker games for celebrity clients. But when her establishment is raided by the FBI for hosting members of the Russian mob, she turns to a charismatic lawyer to help keep her out of jail. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The First Purge
programme.desc: A prequel recounting events that led up to the first Purge event. To push the crime rate below one percent for the rest of the year, the New Founding Fathers of America (NFFA) test a sociological theory that vents aggression for one night in one isolated community(n)

programme.desc: Three Wisconsin college students encounter a monster known as the "Bye Bye Man," who terrorizes and kills his victims by manipulating them with hallucinations. The trio learn that the only way to defeat him is to drive him out of their thoughts entirely(n)

programme.title: Despicable Me 3
programme.desc: Gru teams up with his long-lost twin brother, aspiring supervillain Dru, to take down his most-difficult opponent yet: a former 1980s child star-turned-bad guy named Balthazar Bratt. Meanwhile, the Minions go on strike to protest Gru's lack of interest in world domination. (cc)(n)

programme.title: The Foreigner
programme.desc: A London businessman named Quan is devastated when his daughter is killed in a terrorist attack. He seeks revenge against those responsible, and his pursuit soon leads him to a shady British politico with ties to the terrorist organization(n)

programme.title: The First Purge
